title: Peter Andre 'worried' after catfish impersonated son Junior, 14, to request nudes
text:

Former pop sensation Peter Andre , 46, has admitted he was 'very worried' following the recent incident involving his 14-year-old son Junior.

Last week it was revealed that someone stole Peter's son Junior's identity on Snapchat and was asking people to send them inappropriate images.

The dad-of-four - who shares Junior with ex glamour model Katie Price - has confessed he felt "very worried" but is "proud" of his teenage son.

The teen was targeted by a fraudster who attempted to pose as him in a quest to receive rude imagery on the social media app.

(Image: Instagram)

Writing in his New! magazine column this week, Peter opened up about the difficult time for his son.

He said: "I found it very worrying that someone set up an Instagram account posing as Junior and asked people to send inappropriate pictures.

"But I'm so proud of the way my son handled it."

The Mysterious Girl icon added that this was not the first time this incident had occurred in his family.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Instagram)

He added: "I'm no stranger to having people pose as me online – it’s happened so many times.

"There are about 12 accounts pretending to be Emily, who hasn't been on social media in seven years!"

Peter broke his silence following the worrying incident which saw Junior take to Instagram to warn his fans of the imposter.

The teenager posted a screengrab of the fake account with a caption to discourage his followers to stay away.

He wrote: "I have had ppl ask me if this is me. This is not me. This person is tryna claim it's me."

"If u r one of the ppl who have added this disgusting person then block n report him or she. Acc disgusted. Whoever this is..."

He continued: "Reason I'm so disgusted is cuz they r tryna get u to send inappropriate pictures. N also sending them back claiming to be me.

"Block n report them now if u r one of the ppl to have added them."

The teenager finished by saying: "Ppl R saying they r jusss gon make a new account. Unless u know me in person or I have Dmd u on Insta it is not me!"

Junior appeared clearly frustrated with the fake account, while his dad Peter praised him for calling out the fraudster and uncovering the truth to his followers.

Peter also shares Princess, 12, with reality star Katie Price, while he is also dad to Amelia, five and Theo, two, who he shares with wife Emily, 30.
description: The former pop sensation has opened up about his concerns after an online catfisher posed as his 14-year-old son
